response.skills: Google Sheets, Operations Control, Operational planning, Decision making, Rayos X, Aerolíneas, Auditorías de seguridad, Organización de Aviación Civil Internacional (OACI), Regulaciones de aviación, Hojas de cálculo de Google, Supervisor, Coordinador, On the Job Training, Tracker, Control de operaciones, Toma de decisiones, Planificación operativa, Mejora de procesos, Análisis de procesos, ERP ODOO

profile_positions.description:
• Conducir el plan de auditoría a lo largo de las diferentes áreas de las instalaciones y procesos del aeropuerto, incluyendo inspección de pasajeros/personal/equipaje, control de acceso, sistema perimetral del aeropuerto.
• Identificar deficiencias a través de la implementación de actividades de monitoreo: producir un informe para los auditados relacionado con las deficiencias de incumplimiento identificadas durante las actividades de control de calidad.
• Llevar a cabo actividades de seguimiento.
• Producir informes para el gerente de línea sobre el resultado de las auditorías y actualizar el rastreador de acciones correctivas y base de datos; realizar análisis de datos y cerrar deficiencias no conformes.
• Evaluar y verificar que las regulaciones se apliquen correctamente a través de una amplia gama de monitoreo de cumplimiento actividades, incluyendo, observaciones, auditorías, inspecciones, encuestas y seguimientos; para todas las áreas descritas en el Programa de Seguridad Aeroportuaria.
profile_positions.title: Audit Officer

profile_positions.description:
Rising, structuring, and design of administrative and operational processes.
Optimization of operational processes and ERP Odoo processes.
Process documentation
profile_positions.title: PROCESS ANALYST

profile_positions.description:
Design the daily, monthly and annual planning of operations from the operations control center. Tracking of personnel and flights within the active operation to make timely decisions and with minimum response time to minimize operational failures.
Evaluate and perform studies of times and movements.
Propose new ways and tools to optimize the planning of operations.
Ensure that operations comply with the regulations and / or customer requirements.
Design of shifs to cover the entire operation.
Guarantee that the projects have the human resources required for the development of the operation.
Coordinate with the operations area the requirements of the clients and other legal and labor aspects of the human resource involved in the operations.
Control and reporting of worked hours and surcharges.
profile_positions.title: Operations Planner

profile_positions.description:
Coordination of operation and security personnel.
Verify compliance with regulations DOC 8973 and Annex 17 of ICAO, AOSSP of TSA, SMSL of Transport Canada and RAC 160 of the Civil Aeronautics of Colombia.
Supervise the correct application of the Passenger Prescreening and PBE (Passenger Behavioral Evaluation) methods.
Management of personnel, management of performance indicators.
Design and assignment of shifts.
KPI Control.
OJT Training for new staff.
Customer service.
profile_positions.title: Operations Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Verify compliance with all standard AVSEC procedures for ﬂight operations with local, european and american airlines in Colombia and Panama.
Validation of compliance with the standards established in DOC 8973 and Annex 17 of ICAO, AOSSP of TSA, SMSL of Transport Canada and RAC 160 of Aeronáutica Civil de Colombia.
Delivery of audit reports and monitoring of Corrective Action Plans.
Advice to the operational area regarding AVSEC regulations.
profile_positions.title: Corporative Regional Auditor in AVSEC

profile_positions.description:
Coordination of operation and security personnel.
Verify compliance with regulations DOC 8973 and Annex 17 of ICAO, AOSSP of TSA, SMSL of Transport Canada and RAC 160 of the Civil Aeronautics of Colombia.
Supervise the correct application of the Passenger Prescreening and PBE (Passenger Behavioral Evaluation) methods.
Management of personnel, management of performance indicators.
Design and assignment of shifts.
KPI Control.

profile_positions.title: Operations Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Passenger security interview and screening with the Passenger Prescreening and PBE (Passenger Behavioral Evaluation) methods.
Travel documents check.
Baggage inspection.
X-ray operation.
Aircraft and Ramp Search.
Access control of aircraft and ramp.
Boarding control.
Passenger, catering, cargo and baggage escort.
Customer service.
Security airline procedures for American, European, regional and local airlines.
profile_positions.title: Aviation Security Officer

company.name: Hamad International Airport
company.description:
Designed to meet and exceed the expectations of global travellers, Hamad International Airport is a diverse lifestyle destination of its own. 

Housed in one expansive terminal, the airport integrates contemporary shopping and dining options, entertainment and relaxation facilities, and a world-class art collection from internationally acclaimed artists.
